Text: Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du dure kʼi fʼudu Jihofa fe̩ ugbo o̩wo̩ edu yʼekeji-wñ eju ugbo e̩wñ kʼi du nyʼu o̩wo̩, abe̩k uhio̩-wo̩, abe̩k oji e̩ji, abe̩k i chʼekeji-wñ afuma,
abe̩k i fe̩wñ ki lenyo̩ ye, kʼi la rʼo̩lemi efu-wñ, kʼi la go̩ o̩lemi ef e̩wñ du kʼone̩ ache kʼi adure efu-wñ,
e̩gba kʼone̩ dure kʼi fʼabi je̩, tak i adʼe̩wñ kʼi gba oji le̩ dabiwa, abe̩k e̩wñ kʼi gba afuma, abe̩k e̩wñ ku ma du nyʼu o̩wo̩, abe̩k e̩wñ ki lenyo̩ kʼi fuye,
abe̩k e̩wñ du ki che kʼi go̩ olemi ugbo-wñ; i adʼe̩wñ le̩ dabiwa kʼoji chaka, i año̩ dʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩lu mʼo̩ kʼi du ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi ne̩ eñini eñini kʼi chʼiche̩bo̩ abi-wñ.
Tak i adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e-abi eje̩ Jihofa wa ñw atama, owñ chʼokolo ki mufu kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini, alu kʼe̩ dʼalaja e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi te̩.
Oñ atama ache e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ o̩gba Jihofa, taku ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u ugbo e̩wñ du kʼone̩ ache kʼi ajʼabi.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

E̩ nañwa ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ kakini, E̩wñ ki chʼuko̩-o̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ de̩. E̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo le̩ ajʼoj igbeli oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kwʼodu gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩, ma la adejutʼuna-wñ ki najo̩ waa.

Tak atama adʼikagwoji-wñ e-line̩n efufu tʼo̩la, kʼi la mʼichaka-wñ e-line̩n efufu ko̩ nyʼo̩la, tak i akʼelulu e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kʼuna fʼu lie̩ oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, kʼi kʼo jʼane̩ e̩re̩ ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ o̩wo̩ʼka.
Tak i agwʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ jʼane̩, kʼi mʼe̩wñ o̩la omune̩ ko̩ nyi, kʼi kʼelulu le̩ kwef uru dufu tʼugbo ki de̩ hiolo.

Ma ki dejutʼuna oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ kʼi najo o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, i ki lu n; atama la agu iji jo oji-wñ odudu o̩jo̩ du, i la akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo jʼoji-wñ aro̩ne aro̩ne, i la ñʼagu ula e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ ure̩do̩ jo oji-wñ ge̩.
Una ki najo oji ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩ o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩; i ki lu n.
E̩wñ ki la chʼuko̩-o̩la e̩wñ ele le̩ de̩. Amo̩ma Aro̩n adʼe-le̩ wa che o̩gba Jihofa, o̩gba ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩.

Tak e̩ne̩ʼka-ma adʼe̩ko̩ o̩wo̩ʼka kwef omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ e-e̩wñ ele le̩, manyʼekpo-wñ kpai frankinse̩ns ki dʼoji e̩wñ ele le̩ chaka, kʼi la fʼe-le̩ gujo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kʼi kpo ru Jihofa, kʼi chʼukpe̩ urewa-wñ.
E̩bo̩bo̩-wñ Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ aje̩; ma adʼo̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ n, ma la aje̩ ef uña kiafo̩ʼka; efu ologbo unyabo ujeju le̩ ma aje̩.
Ma adʼo̩jo̩wu tʼo̩ taku ma adʼe̩ n. U mʼe-le̩ du chʼukpe̩ e-ma ef e̩wñ ku ma duwa ñwu mi lʼugbo una; e̩wñ efo̩ e-efo̩ i che, alu kʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure kpai e-abi eje̩ de̩.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du ef amo̩ma Aro̩n aje̩, kʼi chʼukpe̩ e-ma ogbegbele̩ gbogbo nyʼo̩hio̩gu-me̩, ef e̩wñ eduwa ñwu Jihofa lʼugbo una, e̩ne̩ du kʼi kadʼo afo̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

E̩wñ O̩jo̩ kʼAro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ aduwa ñwu Jihofa o̩jo̩ ku ma fʼekpo ba tʼuma oji de̩: owñ chʼukpe̩ e̩ke̩gwa e̩fa omu te̩ke̩te̩ke̩ kʼi mud e̩wñ ele eduwa ño̩ duwa o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩, ukpe̩reji-wñ chʼe-odudu, ukpe̩-reji-wñ chʼe-ane̩.
Ma adʼekpo tʼo̩ ade̩ ef anade; e̩gba kʼi fʼu ñmo̩ nyʼo̩la tak e̩ dʼu wa ejefu; e̩ko̩da e̩ro-wñ dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ ele, e̩ dʼu wa ñwu Jihofa kʼi kpo rʼu.
Oñ atama kʼi dʼef amo̩ma Aro̩n ku ma fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji kʼi akoji-wñ adʼu wa; e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ ogbegbele̩ i che; ma agu o̩chaka-wñ jo ñwu Jihofa.
Ma ki gu e̩wñ ele atama du jo hiele, ma ki je̩ e-le̩ n.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,

E̩ ki ka ñw Aro̩n kpai amo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kakini, E̩wñ ki la chʼuko̩-o̩la e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure de̩. Ugbo ku ma kpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo, o̩mo̩ ma akpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure o̩gba Jihofa; e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ i che.
Atama ki adʼu wa che tod adure, owñ le̩ aje̩; ef uña kiafo̩ oñ ma aje̩ e-le̩, ef ologbo unyabo ujeju.
E̩wñ du ki kado e̩la-wñ afo̩; e̩gba kʼe̩bie̩ le̩ ta nyʼe̩wñ o̩laʼka, e̩ ki fʼe̩wñ kʼi ta nyʼu le̩ gwe̩ ef uña ki afo̩.
Tak ama ki kpʼucha ku ma gwe̩ nyʼu fo̩; i muda che̩wñ ku ma fʼu hi ef ucha ebije ikpa, ma afʼe-le̩ deli, ku ma fʼu larinyo̩ ef omiofo.
E̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du kʼi dʼef amatama aje̩ e-le̩; e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ i che.
Ma muda aje̩ e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure du ku ma dʼe̩bie̩-wñ wʼef unyabo ujeju ku ma ne̩ che e̩wñ e̩boma ef uña ki afo̩ le̩ n; ma anʼuna gu e-le̩ jo.
